name: asKinG English
description:
The game consists of answering a series of questions before your opponents, you have 10 seconds to answer each question correctly, if you answer incorrectly 3 times in a row you will be disqualified from the game. 

There are 4 categories of questions (Sports, History, Geography, Science), in each round the category will be randomly selected and the corresponding question will be shown and 4 or 5 possible answers depending on the number of players in the game. Every 3 rounds the server will randomly select 2 players from the game to have a direct confrontation the player who answers incorrectly is disqualified, while that direct confrontation occurs, the rest of the players will enter spectator mode. 

In order to create a game you will need a certain amount of energy, this in turn is rechargeable either by gems or by time or, failing that, there are totems that give you infinite energy for a limited time. 

AsKinG will use Facebook technology so that users can invite or challenge their friends, you can also share game results among other things.
